TopicTitle: Bug: Pressing Enter when saving game doesn't save game as expected

Articles.Content: Pressing enter when saving a game after giving a name to the file closes the window but doesn't actually save the game.
Hi Spheniscine, just click on the "Save" button to save the game.
Yes, that is an obvious workaround, but the behavior when pressing Enter is unexpected and dangerous, misleading one to think it is actually saved when it is not, and therefore is a bug.
